definition.text: The current workspace is the one you are using at any point.

paragraphs.text: If you close and restart the app, or refresh the UI, the system loads the workspace that was last in use.
Go to the menu of the Workspace node, double-click on the Getting Started label and change the name of the workspace to Basic Education.
Now hit Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Key-S
You just created a new workspace! Go to the My-Workspaces folder to verify the new file is there.
